REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f0386 reute r f BC-GM-<GM>-CANADA-FEBRUA 03-04 0062

TEXT.TITLE: GM <GM> CANADA FEBRUARY CAR SALES OFF 17.8 PCT
TEXT.BODY: General Motors of Canada Ltd, wholly owned by General Motors Corp, said February car sales fell 17.8 pct to 25,779 units from 31,361 units the previous year. Year-to-date car sales fell 23.8 pct from last year, the company said. It did not immediately disclose actual year-to-date figures. Reuter
